text: Joaquim is a 2017 Brazilian drama film directed by Marcelo Gomes. It was selected to compete for the Golden Bear in the main competition section of the 67th Berlin International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Julio Machado * Isabél Zuaa * Nuno Lopes * Rômulo Braga * Welket Bungué * Karay Rya Pua ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Brazilian films Category:Brazilian drama films Category:Portuguese-language films Category:Films directed by Marcelo Gomes
title: Joaquim (film)
